entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0 MAUI App has exited with code 2147943792 (0x80070570) #99465
  • [mono] Missing box optimizations in the interpreter #99463
  • System.Type.GUID is empty on Android #99459
  • OSX PR build artifacts are missing symbols #99456
  • 使用海康sdk的时候需要加载 libcrypto.so.1.1 libssl.so.1.1 提示加载失败 #99455
  • [API Proposal]: Add PeekByte() to BufferedStream #99454
  • AsyncVoidMethodBuilder.NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() crashes with NullReferenceException #99452
  • [API Proposal]: BinarySearch on SortedList<TKey, TValue> #99448
  • System.Security.Policy.Evidence missing in .NET Platform Extensions for .net framework #99447
    9.0.0
  • Flush(true) does not call fsync on first attempt #99445
  • System.Text.Json Serialize when ignoring cycles produces undesired json #99444

Closed

  • ILCompiler doesn't resolve type names for attributes on fields/properties #92259
  • NRE in encoders #89931
    9.0.0
  • Add PeekByte() to BufferedStream #99450
  • [API Proposal]: Add a simple option to inject the default/system TimeProvider. #96717
  • [jitstressregs] Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling fails #99414
    9.0.0
  • Wasm SignalRClientTests timing out #99268
  • System.Data.Odbc bug for connect IRISDB through odbc for unixodbc #80015
  • [MONO][Interp][Wasm] RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #99398

PullRequests

Created

  • `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic attributes #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Evidence types to AcccessControl NETFramework Facade #99462
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99461
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Ensure edge likelihoods 3 #99460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BS_1A, BT_1A #99458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Reenable test on s390x in tests.proj #99453
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Trying to avoid AV while reading a invalid MethodTable #99451
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • [browser][wbt] Extend delay when waiting for URLs #99446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Share EventSource QCall definitions between NAOT and CoreCLR #99441
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Implement Swift lowering algorithm in the CoreCLR type system #99438
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Make Thread.VolatileRead and Thread.VolatileWrite obsolete #99382
    area-System.Threading
  • Add Dictionary<T, List<T>>.AddToList #99434
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][jit] Emit instances when using unmanaged generic calli in gsha… #99381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use the right owning module in type string resolution #99429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][browser] Fix failures in `CalendarTestBase` affecting several globalization tests #99407
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.4
  • Fix GCStress disabling of ParallelCrashTester #99412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workload-testing] Misc improvements #99392
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Fix Promise cancelation #99397
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CC,CD #99284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix tiny regression in Enumerable.ElementAt #99437
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Reduce overheads of enumerating Grouping from Enumerable.GroupBy #99365
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Use sentinel arg to clear error register pre-Swift call #99428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused System.Runtime.Versioning.CompatibilitySwitch #99270
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [RISC-V] Enable crossgen for corelib #99436
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Disallow parameters passed in float regs from being enregistered in int regs #99286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] win-x86: Calling conventions #99430
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix InlineArray and some other corner cases in Swift lowering #99337
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use alias for Tizen and RISCV owners #99435
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable building tests with UseLocalAppHostPack=true #99354
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ILLink/ILCompiler support for feature checks #99267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BW_2A #99411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi…" #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugger] Shipping internal package for webcil #99380
    area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #99413
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser][mt] Disable hybrid globalization for multithreaded runtime #99360
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Consolidate block scaling logic #99234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • [mono] Enable 'compile-in-child' aot mode on ios. #99390
    area-Build-mono
  • [6.0] Fix usage of recycled lists in the thread pool #99387
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.29
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
